title: Went through storage and found this gem.
body:
http://imgur.com/LJt55TF 
http://imgur.com/7KZnVS7

The NES has never been opened. Was a forgotten Christmas present.

My first videogame system. The batteries in super Mario died so I took it apart and put a new cell in. But red blue silver and monster rancher still save!

What's your first system? And how did you aquire it.

Also if you have questions about my save files feel free to ask.
